"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77721</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>18548848-11dc-11d8-9790-00e01829725b#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az állam szerepének megváltozása</string>
            <string language="en">Changing of the role of state</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern der Rolle des Zustandes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changer du rôle de l'état</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança do papel do estado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiando del ruolo di dichiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή του ρόλου του κράτους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cambiar del papel del estado</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az állam szerepének megváltozása a 19. század második felében</string>
            <string language="en">Changing of the state cue in the second half of the 19. century</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szociális állam,  Bécs,  gondoskodó állam,  </string>
            <string language="en">social state, Vienna, provider state</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern des Zustandstichworts zur Hälfte zweite 
des Jahrhunderts 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changer du caractère indicateur d'état dans la 
deuxième moitié du siècle 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança da sugestão do estado ao segundo meio do 
século 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiando dell'indicazione di dichiarare a metà 
secondo del secolo 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή του κρατικού συνθήματος στο δεύτερο μισό του 
αιώνα 19,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cambiar de la señal del estado por la mitad 
segundo del siglo 19.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialzustand, Wien, Versorgerzustand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">état social, Vienne, état de fournisseur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estado social, Viena, estado do fornecedor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sociale dichiari, Vienna, fornitore 
dichiarano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνικό κράτος, Βιέννη, κράτος προμηθευτών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estado social, Viena, estado del abastecedor</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

        <rights>

          </cost>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
